title: Bait n Tracker
description: An app to track the ongoing results of fishing tournaments. Utilizes SQL & Express.js with a clean front-end to allow users to view leaderboards, create an account to enter the competition, and upload data & photos of fish caught.
alt: Screenshot of Bait n Tracker homepage leaderboard table

title: Employee Tracker
description: An app to keep track of employees through roles, departments, and managers. Utilizes SQL & Express.js to provide functionality to create and view employees, roles and departments, and update an employee role.
alt: Screenshot of Employee Tracker backend options

title: Budget Tracker
description: An app to keep track of expenses and income. Utilizes IndexedDB to provide offline access, and is a PWA. Users input transactions, which are saved and graphed on screen.
